Class VoltageSoundView

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent

voltage.core.VoltageSoundView
public class VoltageSoundView
extends VoltageSound
A class to display audio waveforms

  • Constructor Details

    • VoltageSoundView

      public VoltageSoundView​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, VoltageModule module, boolean bClicksReposition, int milsPerPeak)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      displayName - display name of the control.
      module - the module this belongs to.
      bClicksReposition - allows clicking on the waveform to reposition playback.
      milsPerPeak - the number of milliseconds to display per peak.

    • VoltageSoundView

      public VoltageSoundView​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module, boolean bClicksReposition, int milsPerPeak)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to.
      bClicksReposition - allows clicking on the waveform to reposition playback.
      milsPerPeak - the number of milliseconds to display per peak.

      public void SetColors​(java.awt.Color playedCol, java.awt.Color unplayedColor, java.awt.Color backgroundColor, java.awt.Color playIndicatorColor)
      Set the colors for this view.
      Parameters:
      playedCol - the waveform played color.
      unplayedColor - the waveform's unplayed color.
      backgroundColor - the color of the background for this view.
      playIndicatorColor - the color of the playback indicator.
